text: You can define your own intrinsics using llvmcall. Most of the intrinsics in Julia I can think about boils down to one CPU instruction, do it's useful to just think about them as something intrinsic to the CPU itself, i.e. the lowest level of software.

elements.text: You can define your own intrinsics using llvmcall. Most of the intrinsics in Julia I can think about boils down to one CPU instruction, do it's useful to just think about them as something intrinsic to the CPU itself, i.e. the lowest level of software.

text: You can't define intrinsic functions in julia per definition, you can only define functions. llvm intrinsics are not julia intrinsic functions.

elements.text: You can't define intrinsic functions in julia per definition, you can only define functions. llvm intrinsics are not julia intrinsic functions.
